name: bounce-house-rental-system
description: Multi-tenant bounce house rental platform with comprehensive testing

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules server/dist client/build coverage
scripts.security-audit: npm audit && cd server && npm audit && cd ../client && npm audit
